attributes.action: carry out nationalisation of railways in order to relieve road congestion and environmental damage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rail system is abysmal and needs to be taken into government control to provide an efficient national network for passenger and freight services, thus taking pressure off roads and providing more environmentally friendly travel, which is subsidised in those areas necessary, to attract people out of their cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
